title: WTB: Harper's Woodcuts and Peck & Snyder's

posts.post_title: WTB: Harper's Woodcuts and Peck & Snyder's
posts.post_content:
I am interested in buying original Harper's Woodcuts and original Peck & Snyder's that I dont already have in my collection. If you have any, please email me a scan(s) and the price you would like. Thanks!

email to: [url]william.biery@fmr.com[/url]

have some full issues with woodcuts
PM me if interested.
JEff W
